short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your life in your nameplate easily! Click to subtract/add life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for anyone who uses whereby.com to play online Commander/EDH. This extension will simplify your counting! It provides easy access buttons locked to your camera to add and subtract life.
